page.title: 13Recreation Near Ridgewood
page.content: There are three recreational facilities which attract people here. The Barley Mow pub, situated by the busy A22, was built over 200 years ago. It is owned by Phoenix Brewery. It has a large, newly built car park and garden. The landlord likes living in this historic, attractive and friendly area. He enlarged the car park because he has increased his trade by serving a variety of pub food which is proving very popular. Next door is a caravan site which is managed by the pub landlord. The caravans are private holiday homes used from Easter till October. Behind this is the Rugby and Football ground. The club is active throughout the season. The wooden club house has changing and bathing facilities as well as a bar.
